title: Distributed Systems
body: Writing a table booking app using Ruby on Rails and Ember Js, hosted using Docker & Docker-Compose.

title: Independent Studies
body: Tracking mental health over time during Covid-19 using Twitter posts and sentiment analysis in order to determine the emotions a person is feeling based on the language used in a tweet.

title: Data Mining & Foundations of AI
body: Using Python to mine data and learn about machine learning & classification algorithms using a range of data sets.

title: Language Design & Implementation
body: Created an interpreted programming language named "Classy" using JavaCC and abstract syntax trees.

title: Systems Programming
body: 8086 Assembly and extending Xv6 operating system in C to implement outputting shapes and text in various graphics modes.
